types.description: Report an issue with the realm itself.
Report the use of hacks, cheats, or exploits.
Make a suggestion for either the discord server or the realms.
Report something that doesn't fit into one of the other categories.

prompts.label: realm
prompts.prompt: Which **realm** is this report for? If the report isn't specific to any realm, respond with "**N/A**".

prompts.label: urgency
prompts.prompt: Rate the **urgency** of this report on a **scale of 1-5**, 1 being something that can wait with little consequence and 5 being something that absolutely needs imediate attention.

prompts.label: body
prompts.prompt:
Now give the **details** on what you are reporting.
Examples of details: description of bug, names of hackers or griefers, question being asked...
Add any links, screenshots, etc. that may be helpful to an admin in dealing with your report.
To conlcude and send your report, send the message "**end**".
